name: Shinobi Chronicles
description:
This is my University project: Shinobi Chronicles. You take control of a ninja, sneaking through the level while killing enemies on the way.

Controls :

Equipment Change - Pressing the box on the top right corner will cycle through your equipment: Hook, Smoke and Shurikens.

Ability button - Pressed to use the smoke or shurikens

Grappling Hook - Pressing on screen (on the orange blocks) will grapple you up there

Smoke Bombs - Pressing the ability button will throw a smoke bomb when equipped. Hitting enemies with it will remove their vision and stop them temporarily

Shurikens - Pressing the ability will throw a shuriken when equipped. Hitting a enemy will kill them instantly!

Hiding Spots - The things the look like vases? you can hide in them. Walk near them and press on the vase, it'll make you invisible to enemy vision!

- Enjoy the game
